articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Tiger Woods' appearance at rest of 2023 majors in doubt after surgery - The Guardian
articles.description: Tiger Woods had fusion surgery on his right ankle on Wednesday morning, putting in doubt whether he will play any more majors this year
articles.content:
Tiger Woods had fusion surgery on his right ankle on Wednesday morning to alleviate arthritis from a broken bone, putting in doubt whether he will play any more majors this year.
Woods disclosed the… [+3170 chars]

articles.title: "We did what we needed to do" Kevin De Bruyne | Bayern 1-1 (1-4) Man City | UEFA Champions League - Man City
articles.description: City secured a place in the Champions League semi-finals with a 4-1 aggregate victory over German champions Bayern Munich.SUBSCRIBE! http://www.youtube.com/s...

articles.author: Jamie Jackson
articles.title: Haaland on target as Manchester City ease past Bayern to reach semi-finals - The Guardian
articles.description: Erling Haaland scored and Josh Kimmich equalised in Munich as Manchester City beat Bayern 4-1 on aggregate to set up a semi-final against Real Madrid
articles.content: For Manchester City to sail so serenely past the six-times European champions shows how far Pep Guardiola has already taken them. The big question now is can they go all the way and finally seal the … [+5112 chars]

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Gary Ballance retires from all cricket after brief Zimbabwe comeback - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Former England and Yorkshire batter leaves the game after successful return to native country
articles.content: Gary Ballance became only the second player to score a Test century for two different countries  •  Associated Press
